channel.title: Websight wont register members
channel.description:
ok so i tried everything i could now its time to turn for some help :/
my website when you try and register your self wont let you lol it doesn't work the error i get says "The email address you entered(testemail@gmail.com) is invalid or already in use, please choose another one."
funny thing is that there no one registered and it is valid.
site if you want to see for a visual http://www.se7enscape.com/register.ws
my register.ws file:
http://pastebin.com/MiEkuVPC
